short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add an 'Ask ChatGPT' button to exam questions on Exam Topics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exam Topics Helper is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your study experience on Exam Topics.
With this extension, you can easily access additional resources and tools that will aid your learning process.

Features:

1) Ask ChatGPT Button: Quickly send questions to ChatGPT for instant assistance, right from the exam questions page.

2) Useful Links: Access a curated list of valuable resources, including:
- An English dictionary for quick definitions.
- A quick lookup tool for translating or defining words directly from the page.
- A countdown timer to manage your time effectively for each question.
- A prompt search tool that helps you find relevant resources on ChatGPT, Google, Youtube, and more.

This extension aims to streamline your study sessions, making it easier to find information and tools you need to succeed in your exams.
